title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 202.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 202.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) The term
abandoned cemetery has the same meaning found in N-PCL section 1506-c, Town Law
section 291, or County Law section 222, as appropriate. (b) The term assume maintenance and
management means an application by a cemetery pursuant to N-PCL section 1506-c
to assume the management and maintenance of an abandoned cemetery. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
202.2

Adopted

New

York State Register March 9, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 10, eff. 3/9/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
